alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 2:18PM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches for lower elevations; 4 to 8 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Star Valley and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility at times. Blowing and drifting of snow is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please monitor the Bridger-Teton Avalanche Center at JHAVALANCHE.ORG, if your plans include travel into the back country. Back country enthusiasts can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley
